Immunology and Tropical Medicine  George Washington University (GW) Washington, D.C, USA

Public Library of Science San Francisco, CA, USA Kendall McKenzie is the Managing Editor for PLOS Neglected Tropical Diseases and PLOS Sustainability and Transformation. She holds a Master of Fine Arts in Creative Writing from Queens University of Charlotte. Kendall has worked in scholarly publishing since 2013, beginning her career at Duke University Press as a Library Sales Coordinator. She joined PLOS in 2017, and has enjoyed working closely with the journal communities, driving journal strategy forward in order to advocate for these communities in the best way possible.
